biotools.summary: This package implements XGBoost and LightGBM in survival data with partiallikelihood function of cox ph model and smoothed C-index as loss functions. gbm and random forests are also provided in Xsurv function to fit the model.

bioschemas.name: Xsurv
bioschemas.summary: This package implements XGBoost and LightGBM in survival data with partiallikelihood function of cox ph model and smoothed C-index as loss functions. gbm and random forests are also provided in Xsurv function to fit the model.
